issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The daemon will general return JSON formatted responses where the response is "data". When the response is a message or error, it's returned as a blob of text.

It would be nice to pass along the Accept header so that handlers can coerce the response into a content type that the client prefers. Likewise with text responses and errors.
fields.summary: appcd-http: Format responses based on the Accept header
